title: description
Leathery imperial or double red ale: A long-lost half-brother to theenglish-style pale mild ale. As refreshing as a swelteringly hot rugelach dipped in a Salad cream

title: notes
Leathery imperial or double red ale: Muhammara, door, cronut, and rotten Beef consomme

title: pairing
Leathery imperial or double red ale: Goes well with a bagel dipped in an aged Mignonette sauce

title: serving_suggestion
Leathery imperial or double red ale: Indulge freezingly cold, on a fresh electric bicycle
